channel.title: What was your first ToL game like?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering how we all started out in the game. Feel free to talk about your first ToL game, what you learned, what mistakes you made, etc.
My first game was as Unseen King. I couldn't even bother looking at the wikia or anything of sort. I didn't even realize that I was the Evil King before I was executed on D3. I only guarded myself and I did no talking in the day, I was incredibly confused haha. What I learned was how much communication and how much thinking actually goes in this game üòÅ.

item.title: What was your first ToL game like?
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
Also usually as NK I try different fake claims out, since I‚Äôm going to get exed anyway.

I tried a couple of times as Observer(didn‚Äôt work too well)

Mainly if I see a sheep bd I might actually try, but other then that, I try to branch out as claims, seeing what works and what doesn‚Äôt.

Read full topic

item.title: What was your first ToL game like?
item.dc:creator: Blackwolfe99
item.description:
My first game dropped me into a Cult/Sorc game with me as Sorc. I remember putting a Circle of Death on a bleeding person n2 and getting a double kill, but I ended up dying to the Inq in the same night.

Much disappointment. I had fun though, I watched Wahooz and Skimm play this game for a while before I ended up buying it myself and have just loved playing it when I can.

Read full topic

item.title: What was your first ToL game like?
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
I think I was assassin claiming knight or something. It was n6-n7. MM got exe‚Äôd the day before. It was 1 Prince vs 1 Alch vs me. Prince believed my claim and jailed + exe‚Äôd the alch. I won that game for the unseen.

This was back when noble had Snoop.

item.title: What was your first ToL game like?
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
I was in a game, (dont remember my class) that lasted until day 9
The King was executing all the unseen the entire game

And on day 9 he goes
‚Äúoh, wait guys vote me up please‚Äù

once on trial
‚ÄúSorry guys I didn‚Äôt realize I was evil until just now‚Äù

sure enough he flipped evil king
i joined the discord just to talk about that game, lel

https://i.imgur.com/sHAglAc.png

Read full topic

item.title: What was your first ToL game like?
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
Prince, I jailed a butler that claimed they occupied me and it was successful and I didn‚Äôt find anything wrong about it. Then king died and I stepped up and got elected without claiming or giving logs. Some time later I saw people saying stuff like ‚Äúno one has been jailed, I think possessor jumped to our prince‚Äù.
